original_text: The ninth captain for the ninth month was Abiezer the Anetothite, of the Benjamites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
korean_text: 아홉째 달 아홉째 지휘관은 베냐민 자손 아나돗 사람 아비에셀이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: The ninth captain for the ninth month
sentences.korean_translation: 아홉 번째 달의 아홉 번째 대장은

sentences.original_text: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 반에는 이만 사천 명이 있었다.
